alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued November 14 at 8:14AM MST until November 15 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM MST THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 possible. * WHERE...Lower Washington County especially outlying areas outside of St. George including Ivins, Santa Clara and Leeds. * WHEN...From 7 PM MST this evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
